Hilary

care, religion etc...and I do enjoy hearing what interests everyone,
but I want to keep the list focused on the topic of unschooling
please.

messages.subject: once upon a town
messages.msgSnippet: A rather brilliant commentary on health & healing....  bound to promote some interesting discussion with our kids...  While I have no problem with the
messages.messageBody:
"A rather brilliant commentary on health & healing.... bound to promote some
interesting discussion with our kids... "

While I have no problem with the sharing of topics you found interesting in your home, I would prefer a link to it, not the entire commentary unless it's on the topic of unschooling.
We have a lot of different views here about subjects like health care, religion etc...and I do enjoy hearing what interests everyone, but I want to keep the list focused on the topic of unschooling please.

Thanks for understanding.:)

Ren


"If you hold on to the handle, she said, it's easier to maintain the illusion of control. But it's more fun if you just let the wind carry you. "
--Brian Andreas
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingbasics/
